name: Planchette
description:
Description:

Can you find the mysteries of your demise. All it takes is some looking and a Ouija board.

How to Play:

Use the mouse to move the mortals hands. Move the hands over a letter or word to lock it in. Submit letters or numbers until you have answered his question. "He" might not know when your done, so just hold still when your finished.

Credits:

Game created for the WOWIE gamejam 4.0

Game by whataboutme42

Art, visuals, and music by Amburjer(Instagram, YouTube, twitter)

some art assets created with Dall-E (AI image generator)
